step.name: #navmaker
step.dataIntro: Welcome to the platform walkthrough tour! Let's start by exploring the tabs at the top of the page.

step.name: .course-tabs
step.dataIntro: You are in the Course tab, where all the materials are found.

step.name: div#seq_content
step.dataIntro: You are looking at content in a page, or unit.

step.name: .nav-item.nav-item-sequence
step.dataIntro: Notice the trail of breadcrumb links above the content. You are currently on a page, or unit...

step.name: .nav-item.nav-item-chapter
step.dataIntro: ...in a module, or section. Clicking on a breadcrumb will take you to your course's table of contents, and drop you onto the portion related to the section or subsection you clicked on.

step.name: .nav-item.nav-item-course
step.dataIntro: This "Course" link will also take you to the table of contents, but to the beginning, as opposed to a specific section or subsection.

step.name: #sequence-list
step.dataIntro: Every lesson or subsection is structured as a sequence of pages, or units. Each button on this navigator corresponds to a page of content. You should go through the pages from left to right.

step.name: #tab_0
step.dataIntro: You are currently viewing the first page of content.

step.name: #tab_1
step.dataIntro: Move to the next page of content by clicking the icon in the highlighted tab...

step.name: .bookmark-button-wrapper
step.dataIntro: If you want to get back later to the content on a particular page, or you want to save it as something important, bookmark it. A Bookmarks folder on your course home page will contain a link to any page you bookmark for easy access later.

step.name: .course-tabs
step.dataIntro: Visit the Progress page to check your scores on graded content in the course.

step.name: .course-tabs
step.dataIntro: For course-specific questions, click on the "Discussion" tab to post your question to the forum. Peers and course teams may be able to answer your question there.

step.name: a.doc-link
step.dataIntro: For any technical issues or platform-specific questions, click on the "Help" link to access the Help Center or contact support.

step.name: div.course-wrapper
step.dataIntro: That concludes the platform tour. Click Done to close this walkthrough.
